comments:
Using build I200410050800.

1) Select Run... from the run button drop down.
2) Click on "Java Application" item (or any others) in the launch configuration dialog.

Verified that this is mac only, and occurs on two macs locally.

The behavior of your testcase is correct. For a READ_ONLY Combo, Combo.setText() will only change 
the text if the string matches a item in the list on all platforms.

There is something else wrong here.

Fixed > 20041013.

The problem is that Combo was not changing the text even if the string matched a item in the list.
*** Bug 76426 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
